revision.comment: Removed 'unreferenced' citation after removing unsourced PR material, ie most of article.
revision.text:
[[File:The National Italian American Foundation.JPG|thumb|National Italian American Foundation headquarters in [[Washington, D.C.]]]]
The '''National Italian American Foundation''' (NIAF) is a nonprofit, nonpartisan, educational foundation that promotes Italian American culture and heritage. NIAF serves as a resource on the Italian American community and has educational and youth programs including scholarships, grants, heritage travel and mentoring.
==See also== * [[Italian American Congressional Delegation]]
==External links== * [http://www.niaf.org/# National Italian American Foundation] * [http://www.freerepublic.info/focus/f-news/1552892/posts NIAF To Host Italian American Rally For Judge Alito In N.J.] * [http://www.sicilianculture.com/news/mobscene.htm 'Sopranos Mob Scene'-- NIAF Not Amused]
===Similar organizations=== * [http://www.anglo-italianfhs.org.uk Anglo Italian Family History Society] * [http://www.columbuscitizensfd.org Columbus Citizens Foundation]
